title: Filthy 6
description: The sixth and final installment in the Filthy serial novel.Faye’s life had finally come together, things were finally falling into place—until he ruined it. Rhett shattered her heart and destroyed everything.Faye did what she does best—she ran. But this time things are different. She’s different. He’s different. And maybe it’s too late.
author: Megan D. Martin
